abilities.desc: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
abilities.name: Stroke of Fate

abilities.desc: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
abilities.name: Phantom's Embrace
abilities.notes: The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

abilities.desc: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3.0 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
abilities.name: Ink Swell

abilities.desc: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is spell immune, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
abilities.name: Dark Portrait

abilities.desc: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
abilities.name: Soulbind
abilities.notes: Provides vision of both leashed units.
